comments.body: These seems to retune only a promise

But there is still a possibility to return instant values from these hooks. Moreover the official [plugin guidance](https://github.com/rollup/rollup/wiki/Plugins#creating-plugins) (maybe outdated) says no word about promises. In [official tests](https://github.com/rollup/rollup/blob/master/test/form/samples/absolute-path-resolver/_config.js) we can see transform hooks without promises.
That is right, thanks for the clariffication.
